content: Name an animal with black and white fur that is native to the African continent and can weigh up to 500 pounds.

The animal you're describing is the African Penguin, also known as the Jackass Penguin. However, it doesn't weigh up to 500 pounds. If you're referring to an animal with such weight, it might be a confusion with the Giant Panda, which is native to China. In terms of African animals, the closest fit in terms of size and distinctive black and white coloring would be the Plains Zebra, although it doesn't quite reach 500 pounds in weight.
